blocks.title: Back-End
blocks.text: Thrown into a deep-end of a django project on my first day of work, I've learned to thrive in and enjoy back-end development using server-side MVC framework.

blocks.title: Front-end
blocks.text: This is my true passion, the reason I do web development. In addition to being confident with the front-end trifecta of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I've worked with Polymer and Angular 1 and dabbled with React.

blocks.title: UI/UX
blocks.text: When needed, I wear the visual designer hat for the team, creating layouts and graphics. I'm currently learning UX fundamentals from Springboard to hone that aspect of my skills.
